name: IWannaHearYou
0:
”Alexa open I wanna hear you”
”I am quite fine”
”I am not well”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: i wanna hear you
des:
This Skill is designed for elderly or people with difficulties who spend a lot of time alone at home.
It is so intuitive and easy to use that the person does not have to do anything, except answer the question about how he is feeling, at a certain moment, Alexa will proactively ask him.
Thanks to the Skill, the user's caregiver or trusted person will be informed about how the user feels at certain times of the day and will be able to reinforce communication between them.

It is only required to register at "https://console.soloedad.com/skill" indicating the name of the user, the name of the caregiver or trusted person and the telephone number where he will receive the messages. Next, activate the skill on the user's Alexa app and link the account.
Sending messages is FREE.

Compatibility: Works on all Amazon Echo devices as well as the Alexa smartphone app.
Routines: This Skill is designed to be opened through a routine or a presence detector. In the last case, it is advisable to activate the routine daily at times that ensure that the elderly person is close to the Alexa device.

DISCLAIMER: The messages sent by this Skill are for informational purposes only. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.

We are open to suggestions to improve this Skill as we believe that there is much to be done in the field of using voice technology to accompany and make life easier for our elders and loved ones. You can send us your opinion to info@soloedad.com
